item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Geronimo Bar & Grill


Come join the NHC at Geronimo. For those who haven't been, Geronimo is a Southwestern restaurant and bar, known for it's selection of 100 tequila and "authentic Sante Fe cuisine"

Drinks Specials:
- $3.00 domestic beers
- $4.50 house drinks
- $5.00 Margaritas

Appetizers:
- A selection of complimentary assorted appetizers

Visit them on the web at www.GeronimoBarandGrill.com

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

Contact: Doug 203-305-5282

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour at Geronimo
